reviewText: My seven-year-old granddaughter loves sonic underground
Picked out by my four year old son whom was absolutely ecstatic when his DVD arrived! Never the less, when he is satisfied, so am I!!

One of my favorite Sonic cartoons, but Episode 20 Three Hedgehogs and a Baby Is Missing.
I would recommend this to anyone who is a fan of Sonic The Hedgehog.
my son will love it <3 thank you!
My 6 year old likes it but this show is super weird. I never watched it in the 80s, but wow. I have to limit this one or I go crazy.

One of the most interesting takes on Sonic.  It's good for a laugh, and I enjoyed it a lot more than the one featuring the chicken and drillbot.  The songs are sometimes awkwardly forced into the episode, but are almost always fun to hear.  I feel like Underground is the like the missing link between SATAM Sonic and the more goofbally versions of the show out at the time.
This is so nice ad my son seem to like this a lot. I decided to buy him again with another series as well.

My 3 and 5 year old have not stopped watching this since they opened it at Christmas... that was 5 days ago... thanks Santa. They absolutely love the old Sonic episodes and this comes with 3 discs, definitely a steal!
An episode or two are out of order, but besides that the DVD is great and combined with the suggested Vol. 2 DVD, gives you the entire Sonic Underground series
